content: HBC-C Standard T-bolt T-bolts for tension and perpendicular shear loads (2D loads) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Bolts & washers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Universal fit â€“ the same T-bolts can be used in HAC-40 to HAC-70 anchor channels to help simplify logistics and reduce the scope for errors Dustless, low-noise fastening method Applications For use with HAC-40 to HAC-70 anchor channels ### TECHNICAL DATA: Compatible Anchor Channel: HAC-40, HAC-50, HAC-60, HAC-70, HAC-V 35, HAC-V 40, HAC-V 50, HAC-V 60, HAC-V 70 Channel profile: HAC-V 35, HAC-V 40, HAC-V 50, HAC-V 60, HAC-V 70, HAC-V-T Rebar XTS, HAC-V EDGE PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized, Stainless steel, A4, Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Compatible Anchor Channel | HAC-40, HAC-50, HAC-60, HAC-70, HAC-V 35, HAC-V 40, HAC-V 50, HAC-V 60, HAC-V 70 | Channel profile | HAC-V 35, HAC-V 40, HAC-V 50, HAC-V 60, HAC-V 70, HAC-V-T Rebar XTS, HAC-V EDGE | PROFIS Software | Yes | Product type | T-bolts ### ITEMS- 2095685 -
